tech_news.title: Google Turns Ordinary Headphones Into Instant Language Interpreters - CNET
tech_news.description: Google is rolling out a beta version of the Translate app with support for more than 70 languages.

tech_news.title: Porsche Just Unveiled a New 911 GT3 Inspired by Ferdinand Alexander Porsche Himself - Robb Report
tech_news.description: The new 911 GT3 90 F.A. Porsche will be limited to just 90 examples.

tech_news.title: Google and Apple roll out emergency security updates after zero-day attacks - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Apple released patches for all of its flagship devices to fix security flaws under attack. Google also updated Chrome to remediate one vulnerability exploited in the attacks.

tech_news.title: Amazon Prime Video scraps AI-powered TV show recap after 'Fallout' fallout - Business Insider
tech_news.description: Almost a month after Prime Video launched AI-powered Video Recaps, viewers said it shared incorrect plot details about season one of "Fallout."

tech_news.title: Rats Get Even Better At Playing DOOM - Hackaday

tech_news.title: iOS 26.2 is here with Liquid Glass, AirDrop, and Apple Music updates - The Verge
tech_news.description: iOS 26.2 gives iPhones a new way to reduce the Liquid Glass look and introduces AirDrop codes, new features in Apple Podcasts, and “urgent” reminders.

tech_news.title: Mmm, Qi donuts - The Verge
tech_news.description: Ikea has released three new affordable wireless chargers that are limited to Qi2.0 rates.

tech_news.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 sweeps The Game Awards — analysis and full winners list - NPR
tech_news.description: Independent video game Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 swept the Game Awards last night. The L.A. ceremony draws millions of views for its industry honors and exclusive previews of upcoming games.

tech_news.title: Hisense’s CanvasTV is a great Samsung Frame TV alternative at nearly half off - The Verge
tech_news.description: Hisense’s 65-inch S7N CanvasTV is $699.99, a new low price. Tomtoc’s FancyCase-G05 Slim Case and Goal Zero Venture 75 Power Bank are also on sale.

tech_news.title: YouTube TV Review: Even at Its Price, Still the Best Channel Selection You'll Find - CNET
tech_news.description: A standout channel lineup and user-friendly features make YouTube TV a top live TV streaming service, but its value isn't what it used to be.
